name: Light Roast
description: Bright and fruity, with a crisp acidity that highlights the natural flavors of the coffee beans.

name: Medium Roast
description: Balanced flavor with a smooth body, offering notes of caramel and chocolate with a mild acidity.

name: Medium-Dark Roast
description: Rich and bold, with a fuller body and deep notes of cocoa and spice, providing a more intense flavor.

name: Dark Roast
description: Strong and smoky, featuring a bold, robust flavor with low acidity and hints of dark chocolate.
